title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
Meet the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet — built for pros and serious DIYers who demand clarity, comfort, and reliability.

- True Color technology delivers a crisp, accurate view of your weld puddle, reducing eye strain and improving precision.
- Fast auto-darkening with 2 reliable sensors shifts in 1/30000 sec, protecting your eyes during TIG, MIG, and MMA/ARC applications.
- Wide shade range 4–13 adapts to your task, while 1/1/1/1 optical clarity ensures a distortion-free view edge to edge.
- 3.64" x 1.67" viewing area balances visibility and compact protection.
- Solar powered with increased battery life for fewer interruptions and more time under the hood.
- Comfort you can feel: superior pivot-style headgear distributes weight evenly for all-day wear.
- Compatible with cheater/magnifying lenses for enhanced detail work.

Protect your vision, improve your welds, and stay comfortable longer. Step up to the YESWELDER True Color helmet and see the difference in every bead.
